org.daisy.pipeline.script

Class XProcOptionMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.script.XProcOptionMetadata

  • public class XProcOptionMetadata
extends Object
    Metadata associated with an option of an XProc step through custom px:* attributes.
